message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm afraid the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than $1100000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're still looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll appreciate the value of the product at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm at my limit. I'm willing to go up to $980000, but no higher. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're at your limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $980000. I'm willing to meet you at the middle of our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $1015000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll see the value in the product at this price.
